items.sentence: I had a pretty good idea Tom wouldn\'t like my suggestion.
Do you actually think I\'m going to go to Boston with Tom?
Do you have any idea where Tom could\'ve hidden the money?
Tom made sure his children ate everything on their plates.
I\'m going to leave one day earlier than I had planned to.
You should tell Tom that you don\'t want to do that again.
When was the last time you looked at yourself in a mirror?
Tom pried up some floorboards, looking for the gold coins.
What I really want to hear about is Tom\'s new girlfriend.
Tom didn\'t know he was going to die before he was thirty.
